name: assignment-template
description: This is a template repository for the first assignment in BVD 103 at McMaster Continuing Education.

scripts.generate:openapi:all: npm --workspace packages/warehouse run gen && npm --workspace packages/orders run gen && npm --workspace packages/books run gen && npm run generate:swagger
scripts.generate:swagger: npx swagger-cli bundle packages/warehouse/build/swagger.json packages/orders/build/swagger.json packages/books/build/swagger.json --outfile packages/docs/build/swagger.json --type json
scripts.start:all: npm --workspace packages/warehouse run start-server & npm --workspace packages/orders run start-server & npm --workspace packages/books run start-server & npm --workspace packages/docs run start-server
